🚀 Comencemos el Curso Vue.js Full-Stack Profesional

¡Perfecto! Vamos a iniciar con el Sprint 1-2: Core Reactivity. Sigue esta guía paso a paso:

🔥 Día 1: Fundamentos Vue 3.4 - Reactividad y Componentes

Paso 1: Configura tu entorno

# Crea tu proyecto con Vite + Vue + TS
npm create vite@5.1.0 vue-project -- --template vue-ts
cd vue-project

# Instala dependencias clave
npm install pinia@2.1.7 vue-router@4.2.0 tailwindcss@3.4.0
npx tailwindcss init -p

# Configura Tailwind (tailwind.config.js)
module.exports = {
  content: [
    "./index.html",
    "./src/**/*.{vue,js,ts,jsx,tsx}",
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {},
  },
  plugins: [],
}

Paso 2: Crea tu primer componente reactivo

<!-- src/shared/ui/Button.vue -->
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'

// Props con TypeScript
const props = defineProps({
  variant: {
    type: String as () => 'primary' | 'danger' | 'success',
    default: 'primary'
  },
  loading: Boolean
})

// Estado reactivo
const clickCount = ref(0)

const emit = defineEmits<{
  (e: 'click'): void
}>()

const handleClick = () => {
  if (!props.loading) {
    clickCount.value++
    emit('click')
  }
}
</script>

<template>
  <button
    @click="handleClick"
    :class="[
      'px-4 py-2 rounded font-medium transition',
      {
        'bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white': variant === 'primary',
        'bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-600 text-white': variant === 'danger',
        'bg-green-500 hover:bg-green-600 text-white': variant === 'success',
        'opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed': loading
      }
    ]"
    :disabled="loading"
    aria-busy="true"
  >
    <span v-if="loading">Cargando...</span>
    <span v-else>
      <slot>Clic aquí</slot> ({{ clickCount }})
    </span>
  </button>
</template>

Paso 3: Debugging Challenge (Encuentra los errores)

<!-- src/features/dashboard/DebugChallenge.vue -->
<script setup>
import { reactive } from 'vue'

// ❌ Problema 1: Reactividad perdida
const user = reactive({
  name: 'Ana',
  profile: {
    level: 1
  }
})

const updateLevel = () => {
  // ❌ Problema 2: Mutación incorrecta
  user.profile.level += 1
}

// ❌ Problema 3: Destructuración reactiva
const { name } = user
</script>

<template>
  <div>
    <h2>{{ name }}</h2>
    <p>Nivel: {{ user.profile.level }}</p>
    <button @click="updateLevel">Subir nivel</button>
  </div>
</template>

Solución del desafío: 1. Usa ref o reactive para objetos anidados 2. Mutar propiedades directamente con = en objetos reactivos 3. No destructurar propiedades reactivas directamente

🧩 Día 2: Componentes Reutilizables y Composición

Paso 1: Crea un componente Input con validación

<!-- src/shared/ui/Input.vue -->
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, computed } from 'vue'

const props = defineProps({
  modelValue: {
    type: [String, Number],
    default: ''
  },
  label: String,
  type: {
    type: String,
    default: 'text'
  },
  required: Boolean,
  error: String
})

const emit = defineEmits(['update:modelValue'])

const inputValue = computed({
  get: () => props.modelValue,
  set: (value) => emit('update:modelValue', value)
})

// Foco para accesibilidad
const inputRef = ref<HTMLInputElement | null>(null)
const focusInput = () => inputRef.value?.focus()
</script>

<template>
  <div class="mb-4">
    <label 
      v-if="label" 
      @click="focusInput"
      class="block text-sm font-medium mb-1"
    >
      {{ label }} <span v-if="required" aria-hidden="true">*</span>
    </label>

    <input
      ref="inputRef"
      v-model="inputValue"
      :type="type"
      class="w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded"
      :class="{ 'border-red-500': error }"
      :aria-required="required ? 'true' : undefined"
      :aria-invalid="error ? 'true' : undefined"
      :aria-describedby="error ? `${inputRef?.id}-error` : undefined"
    >

    <div 
      v-if="error" 
      id="error-message"
      class="text-red-500 text-sm mt-1"
      role="alert"
    >
      {{ error }}
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

Paso 2: Sistema de diseño con tokens

// src/theme/designTokens.js
export const colors = {
  primary: {
    50: '#f0f9ff',
    100: '#e0f2fe',
    500: '#0ea5e9',
    600: '#0284c7',
    900: '#0c4a6e',
  },
  danger: {
    500: '#ef4444',
    600: '#dc2626',
  },
}

export const spacing = {
  xs: '0.25rem',
  sm: '0.5rem',
  md: '1rem',
  lg: '1.5rem',
  xl: '2rem',
}

export const borderRadius = {
  sm: '0.125rem',
  md: '0.375rem',
  lg: '0.5rem',
  full: '9999px',
}

Paso 3: Implementa un Modal accesible

<!-- src/shared/ui/Modal.vue -->
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'

const props = defineProps({
  show: Boolean,
  title: String
})

const emit = defineEmits(['close'])

const closeModal = () => emit('close')

// Manejo de accesibilidad
const modalRef = ref<HTMLElement | null>(null)

const handleEsc = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
  if (e.key === 'Escape') closeModal()
}

onMounted(() => {
  document.addEventListener('keydown', handleEsc)
  if (modalRef.value) modalRef.value.focus()
})

onUnmounted(() => {
  document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleEsc)
})
</script>

<template>
  <transition name="modal">
    <div 
      v-if="show" 
      class="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4 z-50"
      @click.self="closeModal"
    >
      <div 
        ref="modalRef"
        class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl w-full max-w-md"
        role="dialog"
        aria-modal="true"
        :aria-labelledby="title ? 'modal-title' : undefined"
        tabindex="-1"
      >
        <div class="p-6">
          <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
            <h2 
              v-if="title" 
              id="modal-title"
              class="text-xl font-bold"
            >
              {{ title }}
            </h2>
            <button 
              @click="closeModal"
              class="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700"
              aria-label="Cerrar modal"
            >
              &times;
            </button>
          </div>

          <div>
            <slot></slot>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </transition>
</template>

<style scoped>
.modal-enter-active,
.modal-leave-active {
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

.modal-enter-from,
.modal-leave-to {
  opacity: 0;
}
</style>

📚 Tarea del Sprint: Crea el Header de la aplicación

<!-- src/app/layout/AppHeader.vue -->
<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import AppButton from '@/shared/ui/Button.vue'

const isMenuOpen = ref(false)
const toggleMenu = () => isMenuOpen.value = !isMenuOpen.value

// Implementa modo oscuro aquí
</script>

<template>
  <header class="bg-white shadow dark:bg-gray-800">
    <div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-3 flex justify-between items-center">
      <div class="flex items-center">
        <router-link to="/" class="flex items-center">
          <img 
            src="@/assets/logo.svg" 
            alt="Logo de la aplicación" 
            class="h-10 w-auto mr-3"
          >
          <span class="text-xl font-bold text-gray-800 dark:text-white">
            VueTaskManager
          </span>
        </router-link>
      </div>

      <!-- Navegación desktop -->
      <nav class="hidden md:flex space-x-6">
        <router-link 
          to="/dashboard" 
          class="text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-500 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:text-white transition"
        >
          Dashboard
        </router-link>
        <router-link 
          to="/projects" 
          class="text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-500 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:text-white transition"
        >
          Proyectos
        </router-link>
        <router-link 
          to="/team" 
          class="text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-500 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:text-white transition"
        >
          Equipo
        </router-link>
      </nav>

      <div class="flex items-center space-x-4">
        <app-button @click="toggleDarkMode">
          {{ isDark ? '🌞' : '🌙' }}
        </app-button>

        <!-- Menú móvil -->
        <button 
          @click="toggleMenu"
          class="md:hidden text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300"
          aria-label="Alternar menú"
        >
          <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
            <path 
              stroke-linecap="round" 
              stroke-linejoin="round" 
              stroke-width="2" 
              d="M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16"
            ></path>
          </svg>
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Menú móvil desplegado -->
    <transition
      enter-active-class="transition duration-200 ease-out"
      enter-from-class="transform opacity-0 scale-95"
      enter-to-class="transform opacity-100 scale-100"
      leave-active-class="transition duration-100 ease-in"
      leave-from-class="transform opacity-100 scale-100"
      leave-to-class="transform opacity-0 scale-95"
    >
      <div 
        v-if="isMenuOpen" 
        class="md:hidden bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 shadow-lg"
      >
        <div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-3 flex flex-col space-y-3">
          <router-link 
            to="/dashboard" 
            class="text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-500 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:text-white py-2"
            @click="isMenuOpen = false"
          >
            Dashboard
          </router-link>
          <router-link 
            to="/projects" 
            class="text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-500 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:text-white py-2"
            @click="isMenuOpen = false"
          >
            Proyectos
          </router-link>
          <router-link 
            to="/team" 
            class="text-gray-600 hover:text-blue-500 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:text-white py-2"
            @click="isMenuOpen = false"
          >
            Equipo
          </router-link>
        </div>
      </div>
    </transition>
  </header>
</template>

Criterios de Aceptación:

  1. ✅ Responsive: Menú hamburguesa en móviles (<768px)
  2. ✅ Modo oscuro funcional usando CSS variables
  3. ✅ Navegación accesible con focus management
  4. ✅ Transiciones suaves en el menú móvil
  5. ✅ Iconos SVG para el menú

📌 Próximos Pasos:

  1. Implementa el componente AppHeader en App.vue
  2. Crea al menos 3 componentes más usando la estructura de tokens
  3. Sube tu trabajo a GitHub: 
    git add .
git commit -m "feat: implement AppHeader and core components"
git push origin main
